about us

Who are we?

We are a group of professional and passionate lawyers, economists, and developers, here to help you start your business from scratch. Our team thoroughly examines all the details of your future business and plans appropriate actions to move forward

Acalista group provides you with support in all areas of your business from A to Z to make sure everything runs smoothly.

All you need to do is to sit back and relax while your business starts running. We’ve helped hundreds of clients to get their businesses up and running
